feature.name: EXPLAIN (WAL) support
feature.description: [EXPLAIN](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/sql-explain.html) can now track WAL usage information along with [auto_explain](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/auto-explain.html), [autovacuum](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/routine-vacuuming.html#AUTOVACUUM), and [pg_stat_statements](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/pgstatstatements.html). For more …
